.class public auto ansi sealed StoreContentChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"> event raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> class.
